name: sticky-hold
short_effect: Prevents a held item from being removed by other Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Items held by the Pokémon are stuck fast and cannot be removed by other Pokémon.
